scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others --success first -n server,desktop "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w desktop"
scripts.dev:all:clean: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/kill-ports.ps1 && npm run dev:all
scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w desktop
scripts.test: npm run lint:i18n && npm test -w server && npm test -w desktop
